name: Treachery In Beatdown City: A new way to beat-em-up!
blurb: Use a mix of brawling & a snappy custom COMBO creation system against punks, thugs, gentrification & more in Treachery in Beatdown City

rewards.reward: No Reward
EARLY BIRD GAME COPY\r\n===========================  DRM free Copy of the game  on PC/MAC \r\n===========================
EARLY BIRD GAME COPY =========================== DRM free Copy of the game on PC/MAC ===========================\r\nOur first tier went so fast, here's a new tier!

BRAWLER! =========================== GAME for PC/MAC + BACKER FORUMS + EARLY ACCESS 
===========================   Your name will also be listed as a BRAWLER backer in the credits.
=========================== 
+Included in all above tiers

FRESH BEATDOWN =========================== Digital soundtrack + PDF Instruction Manual + exclusive backer wallpapers =========================== Receive the awesome full digital soundtrack composed by Inverse Phase, super cool PDF manual filled with art, stories, strategies & tips, just like when you bought games back in the day! \r\n=========================== +Included in all above tiers

DELUXE FIGHTER ===========================   BONUS COSTUMES + WEAPONS ===========================  Receive early access to 6 cool exclusive weapons & 9 costumes for your heroes! + vote for which weapons/costumes are added.\r\n=========================== +Included in all above tiers
EARLY BIRD - SUPER BETA FIGHTER\r\n============================= All rewards of the $40 tier below. Save some money by supporting us early!

SUPER BETA FIGHTER =========================== EARLY ALPHA/BETA BUILDS ===========================  Play early, unfinished builds to play the game and give feedback (or not) to help with active development + Your name will be listed under SUPER BETA FIGHTER in the credits!\r\n=========================== +Included in all above tiers, each backer will be credited once.

FINE ART FIGHTER ===========================  PDF Art Book + Strategy Guide ===========================   Receive an awesome PDF art book featuring amazing watercolor, ink, pencil and digital art as well as an in depth strategy guide detailing enemy stats, bios, and tips you won't find in the manual! + Your name will be listed under FINE ART FIGHTER. =========================== +Included in all above tiers, each backer will be credited once.
EARLY BIRD - DEV TIER =============================All rewards of the $64 tier below. Save some money by supporting us early!

DEV TIER =========================== Actively participate in game development!
===========================  Sit down with the team via google hangouts and get involved in the games ongoing development - the next closest thing toward working on the game!
=========================== +Included in all above tiers, each backer will be credited once.
=========================== 
Backers will be credited as DEV TIER

RAD ENOUGH? ===========================  T-SHIRT TIER - CHOOSE ONE OF TWO VERSIONS! =========================== Are you rad enough to wear this T-shirt? Choose to support Barak Orama's freedom, or to support the game + Your name will be listed in the credits under RAD ENOUGH!\r\n=========================== \r\n+Shirt not automatically included in all above tiers, please see Add-ons. Each backer will be credited once

PHYSICALITY ===========================  DELUXE PHYSICAL EDITION - GAME + T-SHIRT + SOUNDTRACK CD ===========================  Receive a physical CD complete with printed cover and liner notes. \r\n=========================== \r\nLater tiers do not automatically include these items. Each backer will be credited once.

EXTRA PHYSICALITY DX ===========================   PRINTED ART BOOK ===========================  Receive a printed and signed version of the art book featured in the FINE ART FIGHTER tier + PHYSICALITY tier\r\n=========================== \r\nLater tiers do not automatically include these items. Each backer will be credited once.

POST NO BILLS =========================== BE ON A POSTER IN GAME\r\n=========================== \r\nGet a picture of yourself, a character you created or just your name immortalized on a poster in the background of a fight stage. =========================== Warning, 8 bit stylization can be tricky for intricate ideas. =========================== Character must be your own design and we reserve the right to reject any concepts, but we'll work with you to make it fit. + Receive everything in the DEV TIER. Shirt + Physical Soundtrack + Physical Artbook not included. Please see add-ons section.

PAINT THE TOWN =========================== GET A CUSTOMIZED GRAFFITI TAG IN THE GAME ===========================  We will make some graffiti using your name, avatar or whatever you want us to or submit your own graffiti design to be pixelated and put in the game (must be your own creation). We reserve the right to reject any concepts, but will work with you to make sure you are happy. Does not include POST NO BILLS tier. + Receive everything in the DEV TIER. \r\n===========================\r\nShirt + Physical Soundtrack not included. Please see add-ons section.

PIXEL PORTRAIT =========================== BE A STREET ENEMY IN THE GAME =========================== Have your likeness or a character you created turned into an enemy on the streets with increased stats. =========================== Receive a digital sprite sheet that includes a detailed portrait, a smaller version of the portrait, as well as regular fighter style character complete with walk cycle and a couple of attacks! + Receive everything in the DEV TIER. =========================== Does not include POST NO BILLS or PAINT THE TOWN tier. Shirt + Physical Soundtrack not included. Please see add-ons section.

PIXEL PORTRAIT II =========================== BE A STREET ENEMY IN THE GAME =========================== PIXEL PORTRAIT sold out so quick, we're offering a super limited amount extra. Receive everything in the Pixel Portrait tier.

DESIGNER OF EVIL\r\n===========================  DESIGN/BE A NINJA DRAGON TERRORIST! =========================== Help us make some cool Ninjas, you can even be one! Your Ninja Dragon terrorist can carry cool weapons, have a variety of fighting moves and more! Also you get to write some dialog for the character and you'll get a cool copy of the sprite sheet. ===========================We reserve the right to reject any concepts, but we will work with you over skype one on one to make sure everyone is happy. + Receive everything in the DEV TIER. =========================== Does not include PIXEL PORTRAIT, POST NO BILLS or PAINT THE TOWN tier. Shirt + Physical Soundtrack not included. Please see add-ons section.

FINE ART OF FIGHTING ===========================  EXCLUSIVE SIGNED HAND DRAWN ARTWORK OF ANY CHARACTER IN THE GAME =========================== Receive an amazing 1 of a kind physical water color & ink drawing of any character in the game, signed by the artist Diana Santiago! + receive a digital scan of the file. + Receive everything in the DEV TIER! \r\n===========================\r\nYour name will be in the credits under a special custom title.

VAIN FIGHTER ===========================  EXCLUSIVE SIGNED DRAWING OF YOU, BEATDOWN CITY STYLE ===========================  Receive a 1 of a kind physical drawing/painting of you in an action pose Treachery in Beatdown City style + signed by the artist Diana Santiago! + receive a digital scan of the file. 
===========================
Your name will be in the credits under a special custom title. 
=========================== Receive everything in the DEV TIER.

Ultimate Boss Fighter =========================== BE A BOSS IN THE GAME + be in a cutscene + have a bio in the game =========================== Have your likeness placed as a boss enemy on the streets of East Fulton! You will be a unique boss enemy with your own fighting moves & stats. You will receive everything in PIXEL PORTRAIT tier (sprite sheet, etc.) + you will have a bio in the game, as well as a cutscene featuring your character that you will get to help write! + a special thank you in the credits 
===========================
Your name will be in the credits under a special custom title. 
=========================== 
Receive everything in the PIXEL PORTRAIT TIER

Ultimate Boss Fighter II
===========================
BE A BOSS IN THE GAME + be in a cutscene + have a bio in the game ===========================
The sequel to Ultimate Boss Fighter I. All things from Ultimate Boss Fighter tier included.

RUN BEATDOWN CITY ===========================  BE A BOSS IN THE GAME + PERSONAL GRAFFITI + HELP DESIGN A BUILDING IN THE BACKGROUND =========================== SPECIAL COMBO OF ULTIMATE COUNTER + PAINT THE TOWN + RECEIVE PHYSICAL ART BOOK + SHIRT + CD + PDF MANUAL - Receive a RUN THIS TOWN backer credit in the game and a special thank you.

BEATDOWN CITY TOURIST ===========================  Come to New York City (flight and living arrangements not included) and have a tour with the team of New York from their unique perspective. We'll even buy you lunch at one of our favorite places, Katz' deli! Sit in and get an in depth look at game development. These tours will begin after the game is done. Also receive BEATDOWN TOURIST credit and a special thank you. + Receive everything in the EXTRA PHYSICALITY DX  tier!
S-Tier Executive Producer\r\n===========================\r\nBe listed in the credits first as an executive producer, + receive everything in the BEATDOWN CITY TOURIST tier!
